TranRunJLite
Class TrjTask

java.lang.Object
  TranRunJLite.TrjTask
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClothesMachine, Counting, DataLogger, MotorSim, ProfileGenerator, PWMGenerator, SISOFeedback
public abstract class TrjTask
extends java.lang.Object

The task class. Tasks in this system all have equal priority. TrjTask is abstract; the extending class must define RunTask() which is where the specific task activities take place.

Author:
DMA

Constructor Detail

TrjTask

public TrjTask(java.lang.String name,
               TrjSys sys,
               int initialState,
               boolean taskActive)
Constructor for TrjTask

Parameters:
name - the name of this task
sys - the TrjSys of which this task is a part
initialState - The state that will be executed first
taskActive - If TRUE this task will be active
stateNames - A list of the names of the states
Method Detail

UpdateState

public void UpdateState()
Update the state information for this task. The main job here is to figure out if the task should execute its ENTRY section.

SetCommand

public void SetCommand(int cmd)
Issue a command to a task. Only one command can be active -- there is no task queue. A new command issued before the old one is executed will erase the old command. The command value -1 is used to indicate that no unexecuted commands are available.

Parameters:
cmd - The command. Must be a non-negative integer

GetCommand

public int GetCommand()
Get the command. A return of -1 means no command is available

Returns:
The command value (-1 indicates no command is active)

SetStateTracking

public void SetStateTracking(boolean st)
Set the tracking state for this task. When state tracking is on all state transitions will be recorded.

Parameters:
st - Turn state tracking on (true) or off (false)

SetTrigger

public void SetTrigger(boolean t)
Set the trigger. If 'true' and if the controller is in trigger mode, this will cause the controller to run. The trigger is cleared once the controller has run.

Parameters:
t - Trigger value

SetTriggerMode

public void SetTriggerMode(boolean t)
Set the trigger mode. If set ('true') the controller will only run when its trigger has been set by another task, usually a supervisor type of task that determines setpoints for a feedback controller.

Parameters:
t - Trigger mode ('true' to put controller into trigger mode)

CheckTime

public boolean CheckTime(double t)
Check to see if this is the correct time to run the controller It will use either time or the trigger value depending on which mode the controller is in.

Parameters:
t - Current time
Returns:
'true' to run the controller now

RunTask

public abstract boolean RunTask(TrjSys sys)
Each task defines its own version of RunTask This method is abstract

Parameters:
sys - The TrjSys of which this task is a part
Returns:
repeatTask; if "true" this task is repeated immediately

RunTaskNow

public abstract boolean RunTaskNow(TrjSys sys)
Each task uses this method to determine whether it wants to run or not.

Parameters:
sys - The TrjSys of which this task is a part
Returns:
"true" to run this task now.
